text:
Hi <@U0322LSLLSY>,
It is great to connect with you.

I am the Content Lead for the marketing team at Content Beta - a SaaS-focused video production company. I have been doing research on the current trends and practices in the fields of product marketing, growth and sales. I am linking my blogs on all data that we have analyzed and broken down on marketing, growth, and management for you to read. They might prove to be really useful to you: <https://www.contentbeta.com/guides/>

You can also tune in to the podcasts we have been hosting with thought-leaders and experts of the industry. *The Product Marketing Show:* <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MhRiFoplG1M&list=PLRvVyxL4rqqsn-3QBIZO2MfuqRDwr5sKz>

text: Hey everyone! Thank you for having me. My name is Sonja and I am a digital marketer with experience in B2C (automotive) and B2B (wholesale) content and social media management. I'm based in Germany and I randomly get passionate about things. My latest obsession is 3D modeling. You can find me on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/sonjaalbanese/|Linkedin> and <https://twitter.com/SonjaAlbanese|Twitter>. I am looking forward to connecting & exchanging ideas with you :blush:

text:
Jelloow,

Happy Friday :)

My name is Jolien, and I am the founder of <http://Jelloow.com|Jelloow.com>
We’re helping brands prioritize projects + select their marketing agency partners for 2022.
Or being the matchmaker between companies & agencies.

Happy to be connected!
If you ever need marketing support or advice, happy to hop on a call.

Have a great one,
Jolien
<http://Jelloow.com|Jelloow.com>
<https://meetings.hubspot.com/info11912/jelloow>

text:
Hi everyone!

My name is Lily, I am a white and Afro-Indigenous woman and founder of a multicultural social enterprise, <https://www.instagram.com/sankaramarket/|Sankara Market>. We're named after the revolutionary anti-colonial pan-African Thomas Sankara (learn about his work and life <https://www.google.com/search?q=thomas+sankara&rlz=1C5CHFA_enCA934CA935&oq=thomas+sankara&aqs=chrome..69i57j46i433i512j0i512l2j46i512j0i512l3j46i175i199i512j0i512.3614j0j4&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8|here>).

I work for <https://www.linkedin.com/company/thetribenetwork|Tribe Network> by day as their Startup Services Lead in Atlantic Canada. Our vision at Tribe Network is a world where Black, Indigenous and People Of Colour are at the forefront of entrepreneurship and innovation globally.

Connect anytime!

Wela'lioq (thank you all),

Lily

attachments.text: View this profile on Instagram            Sankara | Online 🌍 Marketplace (@sankaramarket) • Instagram photos and videos

text:
Hey :wave::wave: Kurt here. I’m the growth manager at legaltech start-up <http://rallylegal.com|Rally>. We’re remote-first, however we have locations in Miami, Toronto, Vancouver, New Brunswick, and St. John’s. Looking forward to meeting you all (feel free to connect on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/kurtdunphy/|LinkedIn>).

Something I’ve been working on a lot lately (and would love to chat more on) is building out our content library for search (so far so good), HMU about scaling search and building high-quality content.

text:
Hey, all! :wave:  Thanks for having me!

I’m <https://www.chrislamonica.co/|Chris>! I’m a Content Marketer with around 8+ years of experience across tech, finance, real estate, and more!

I was most recently Content Marketing Manager at <https://www.linkedin.com/company/hyperscience|Hyperscience> until their recent mass layoff event—so I’m here looking for new opportunities, to learn from my fellow marketeers, and to advocate for the superiority of the Oxford Comma!

Feel free to connect with me on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/christopher-lamonica/|LinkedIn> and let me know if you’re looking for a Content Marketer with a fountain pen collection that is far too large! :lower_left_fountain_pen:

> *Fun Fact:* My profile picture is a baseball card of myself and my cat “Poe” :smirk_cat: produced by The Topps Company when I was the QA Proofreader there. It’s one of four cards you can actually find as “easter eggs” in the many packs they’ve actively sold!

Chris

! I’m a Content Marketer with around 8+ years of experience across tech, finance, real estate, and more!

until their recent mass layoff event—so I’m here looking for new opportunities, to learn from my fellow marketeers, and to advocate for the superiority of the Oxford Comma!

and let me know if you’re looking for a Content Marketer with a fountain pen collection that is far too large!
Fun Fact:
My profile picture is a baseball card of myself and my cat “Poe”
produced by The Topps Company when I was the QA Proofreader there. It’s one of four cards you can actually find as “easter eggs” in the many packs they’ve actively sold!

text: i'm looking into ways to archive the entire history of this slack channel and make it searchable. i think it's possible and i think it's our best option. moving to another platform would be too disruptive

text: it'd require about $10k/month to upgrade this slack community and all we'd get is a searchable history. i think there's a better way.
